descr: "This resource allows for the definition of various types of plans as a sharable, consumable, and executable artifact. The resource is general enough to support the description of a broad range of clinical artifacts such as clinical decision support rules, order sets and protocols."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a PlanDefinition resource"

fields.name: url
fields.descr: "An absolute URI that is used to identify this plan definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this plan definition is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the plan definition. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions)."

fields.name: _url
fields.descr: "Extensions for url"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "A formal identifier that is used to identify this plan definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance."

fields.name: version
fields.descr: "The identifier that is used to identify this version of the plan definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the plan definition author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence. To provide a version consistent with the Decision Support Service specification, use the format Major.Minor.Revision (e.g. 1.0.0). For more information on versioning knowledge assets, refer to the Decision Support Service specification. Note that a version is required for non-experimental active artifacts."

fields.name: _version
fields.descr: "Extensions for version"

fields.name: name
fields.descr: "A natural language name identifying the plan definition. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation."

fields.name: _name
fields.descr: "Extensions for name"

fields.name: title
fields.descr: "A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the plan definition."

fields.name: _title
fields.descr: "Extensions for title"

fields.name: type
fields.descr: "The type of asset the plan definition represents, e.g. an order set, protocol, or event-condition-action rule."

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of this plan definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: experimental
fields.descr: "A boolean value to indicate that this plan definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage."

fields.name: _experimental
fields.descr: "Extensions for experimental"

fields.name: date
fields.descr: "The date  (and optionally time) when the plan definition was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the plan definition changes."

fields.name: _date
fields.descr: "Extensions for date"

fields.name: publisher
fields.descr: "The name of the individual or organization that published the plan definition."

fields.name: _publisher
fields.descr: "Extensions for publisher"

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "A free text natural language description of the plan definition from a consumer's perspective."

fields.name: _description
fields.descr: "Extensions for description"

fields.name: purpose
fields.descr: "Explaination of why this plan definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has."

fields.name: _purpose
fields.descr: "Extensions for purpose"

fields.name: usage
fields.descr: "A detailed description of how the asset is used from a clinical perspective."

fields.name: _usage
fields.descr: "Extensions for usage"

fields.name: approvalDate
fields.descr: "The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage."

fields.name: _approvalDate
fields.descr: "Extensions for approvalDate"

fields.name: lastReviewDate
fields.descr: "The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval, but doesn't change the original approval date."

fields.name: _lastReviewDate
fields.descr: "Extensions for lastReviewDate"

fields.name: effectivePeriod
fields.descr: "The period during which the plan definition content was or is planned to be in active use."

fields.name: useContext
fields.descr: "The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate plan definition instances."

fields.name: jurisdiction
fields.descr: "A legal or geographic region in which the plan definition is intended to be used."

fields.name: topic
fields.descr: "Descriptive topics related to the content of the plan definition. Topics provide a high-level categorization of the definition that can be useful for filtering and searching."

fields.name: contributor
fields.descr: "A contributor to the content of the asset, including authors, editors, reviewers, and endorsers."

fields.name: contact
fields.descr: "Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher."

fields.name: copyright
fields.descr: "A copyright statement relating to the plan definition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the plan definition."

fields.name: _copyright
fields.descr: "Extensions for copyright"

fields.name: relatedArtifact
fields.descr: "Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references."

fields.name: library
fields.descr: "A reference to a Library resource containing any formal logic used by the plan definition."

fields.name: goal
fields.descr: "Goals that describe what the activities within the plan are intended to achieve. For example, weight loss, restoring an activity of daily living, obtaining herd immunity via immunization, meeting a process improvement objective, etc."

fields.name: action
fields.descr: "An action to be taken as part of the plan."
